phrases: You are not going to save me?
We have no quarrel with you, but since you have seen the girl...
He is thought to be invincible because of his immense strength.
I could not let you go and become their target.
I am already hungry and now I used all that energy.
it should be no problem for you to protect one girl.
I might be assaulted again by more men like them.
A real man would want to protect a lady!
Besides, who calls their savior pathetic without even thanking him?
Okay, then why do not you come with me to Shinshu Ueda?
What if I buy you some soba to thank you?
You are hungry, are not you?
You are still on your first bowl?
You do not eat much, do you?
I have a name, you know.
What do you do for a living?
I will kill you, you bitch.
If you are a samurai, does that mean you serve a master?
It is none of your business.
That explains why you are so poor that you followed me just for some soba.
I finally get to hear you say it.
It is been days since I have been able to relax like this.
It is probably because you will protect me.
I did not think you would at first.
You did not seem to want anything to do with me.
But when you threw me over your shoulder,
I knew you would do it.
I knew you would protect me.
I was not going to die there.
But you could have left me.
You would not stop screaming for me to rescue you.
Saizo, you are a good guy, are not you?
If you are done eating, let us go.
I will leave our payment here.
Hey, that thing's going to fall off your head.
You should be fine from here.
Walk along the dike so you will be seen.
Go with me a little farther.
I do not know how to get into the castle.
I will not let you leave.
I am a priestess of Izumo.
What is a priestess doing with an Iga assassin?
I have had enough of you and your friends.
Run back to your master, you dog!
Why do not you see if he will give you a bone?
I will not let you get away with defiling Sanada lands.
Stop breathing on my face, dog breath.
I am Sarutobi Sasuke, head of the Sanada Ninja Clan.
Do not get ahead of yourself, Koga monkey.
Those who hear the name Kirigakure Saizo do not live to tell the tale!
Thanks for the fun, you bastard.
You are not too bad, monkey.
Do not assume I am like you.
Masters do not mean shit to me.
I came here to see someone named Sanada Yukimura!
So this is the formidable Ueda Castle.
It is awfully plain, is not it?
I thought I would be excited to see my first castle.
This is the eccentric and clever lord,
You are a priestess of Izumo?
First, let us hear your story.
The shrine was a sea of fire.
The smell of blood made me sick.
Seek out Sanada Yukimura of Shinshu.
They pursued me, the only survivor.
If Saizo had not saved me, I would not have made it here.
I do not know what to do.
A harsh story for a girl unfamiliar with war.
What do you want me to do?
The priest only told me to ask for your assistance.
Yeah, but I do not want to be an accomplice in your revenge.
I never asked you to avenge them!
You said you are being chased?
What if they come after me?
I do not get involved in dangerous work.
Sorry, but there is nothing I can do for you.
Still, even I am not that cold-hearted.
Rokuro, prepare a room for her.
Do not let it get you down.
Do you know how I felt coming here from Izumo?!
I left everyone and escaped alone!
I am the only one who survived...
Be a good girl and stay in the castle.
But even if I stay there, I do not know what I will do tomorrow.
Besides, maybe we were meant to meet.
I cannot have you following me.
I will just camp out here by myself tonight!
If a wolf eats me, at least come and collect my bones.
Do not get the wrong idea.
I am not what you think I am.
Even if you died here, I would not care.
They are stronger than the ones from this afternoon.
I thought I smelled some raccoon dogs.
You are Ieyasu's men, are not you?
I had to see what we were up against.
But you are not a man who falls so easily to enemies like this, are you?
Watch carefully, Sanada Yukimura, Sarutobi Sasuke!
Why did this have to happen?
Those who mock us will be destroyed.
You really did save me, Saizo!
The trees rotted away in an instant.
What is going on, old man?
But those raccoon dogs will not give up so easily.
I will not let them have you.
Could you take him in as your own?
What do you think you are saying?!
I have got nothing to do with this.
Just being around you wears me out!
You owe the girl a favor?
As a man, you will have to repay her.
I am counting on you, Saizo.
I did not expect the two of them to end up here like this.
I suppose you could call it a coincidence.
Rokuro, you saw it, too, did not you?
The power to destroy all living things.
The one who controls that power controls the world.
That raccoon dog desires more than he deserves.
It is time to teach him a lesson.
I do not have enough yet.
I need one brave warrior for each finger on these two hands.
What are Sarutobi and that guy up to?
I do not trust that lord,
but it will be interesting to see what Sanada Yukimura's planning.
What did he do to me?
What are you doing half naked in my futon?
It is warmer if we sleep together.
Let us get out of here!
Do not screw with me, Sanada ninja!
This is not worth the trouble.
Just so you know, I have no intention of being your friend.
Who are you calling a womanizer?!
They are noisy and always getting in the way.
Sasuke, I did not get enough food.
Starting tomorrow, I will give you extra.
The next episode of Brave 10 is Dark and Light.
